name: Splinter City OCT: Audition
description:
The first chapter in Winona's journey to a city disconnected from time... with an unexpected guest following her.

This audition is in the form of a visual novel game. You can either click the screen or press the right key button to continue. Created in TyranoBuilder.

Error Log: -If the game says "backlog" to start with, that means it is still loading. Wait a few seconds and then hit "back". The first frame should load soon enough.

-Fallingfeather
